1000000111100111 0100001000000101 0 -> sum: 1100001111101100, cout: 0
1010110101000000 1011110001100100 0 -> sum: 0110100110100100, cout: 1
0100111001100100 0111101001100110 1 -> sum: 1100100011001011, cout: 0
1011110000100010 0111001000001001 1 -> sum: 0010111000101100, cout: 1
